trends: There have been no other sightings in Clayton
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: started out looking at the night sky and saw bright light. Observed for a minute or so then watched as it blasted an extreme bright light and burst upward toward sky, then vanished. Clear sky
divs: Sighting DetailsWas in back yard. Watching night sky while having a cig. Observed bright light in south east sky.. No clouds and alot of stars. Watched as light grew brighter then flashed like a flash bulb and went upward very fast then vanished. This occurred around 10. pm
